Troopers with this Skill have a special talent for sensing danger, which enables them to react swiftly to any surprise attack.

{{css_skillbox |black| COMBAT INSTINCT | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Optional }}
{{effects}}
* The user ignores '''[[Surprise Attack]]''' MODs from attackers.
{{css_skillbox-end}}


{{important-start}}
The [[Stealth]] Special Skill is not effective against Troopers with Combat Instinct.
{{important-end}}


{{see-also-start}}
In Infinity N4, this ability was part of the '''[[Sixth Sense]]''' Special Skill.
{{see-also-end}}
